Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: MEN IN RED SUITS: THE SECRET HISTORY OF SANTA CLAUS
Clip.Episode: Men in Red Suits: The Secret History of Santa Claus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every year men put on red suits, stuff pillows under their belts, and transform themselves into Santa Claus. Who are they personifying? A Christian saint or a pagan deity, a toy salesman, soft-drink spokesman or that mystical being who can fulfill every child's dream?

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.Episode: Train of The Imperial Cities - Morocco
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travels on the most beautiful train rides and make fascinating encounters at different stops along the way.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Harry Nigh works with the "worst of the worst," repeat sex offenders and murderers newly released from the Canadian prison system.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tina Simpson ignores dire travel warnings and ventures into rural Haiti with a mobile clinic.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey over New Brunswick's Bay of Fundy coastline explores geological wonders, the loyalist city of Saint John and international borders beyond and one of the world's most famous waterways.

Clip.Episode: Men in Red Suits: The Secret History of Santa Claus
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Every year men put on red suits, stuff pillows under their belts, and transform themselves into Santa Claus. Who are they personifying? A Christian saint or a pagan deity, a toy salesman, soft-drink spokesman or that mystical being who can fulfill every child's dream?

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Vintage clothing store owner Doris Raymond is always on the lookout for the "Holy Grail"; the iconic piece that has been touched by one of the world's greatest designers. During a trip to an expo show in Dallas, she learns of such a garment, found discarded at the bottom of a closet

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The history of 20th-century America is on display at Doris Raymond's vintage clothing boutique, The Way We Wore(R). Decades of high fashion from iconic designers fill the racks of this boutique, each telling a story about society at the time.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get the real story behind some of the silver screen's most iconic films and characters.

Clip.Title: MYSTERY OF THE HOPE DIAMOND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Hope Diamond is the world's most valuable diamond, estimated to be worth hundreds of millions of dollars. It is renowned for its nearly flawless clarity and rare deep-blue colour, but does it bear a curse?

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Sun, beaches and holidays re-live the story of a region from secluded romantic bays to urban landscapes where the sea plays a major role.

Clip.Title: MINDFIELD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Bangladesh millions of people are impacted by contaminated levels of arsenic in drinking water. Scientists are trying to unravel the mystery between arsenic and selenium that could hold the key to saving lives.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Eat Less, Live Longer, The Sweet Science of Chocolate and Animal Chefs
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Scientists are exploring longevity by discovering ways to make animals live longer through calorie restriction. Meet chocolate makers who'll explain the elaborate engineering and chemistry behind this tasty treat, and also learn why it's good for your health! And, learn what it takes to come up with nutritious and tasty meals to feed thousands of species at diners at aquariums and zoos.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Climate Change: The World At Tipping Point
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What kind of planet will our children inherit? Meet hydrologists, geologists and marine biologists that are discussing the environmental changes that are taking place and get an in-depth look at what's being done to reverse the trend.

Clip.Title: THE ICEBERG PROJECT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Engineer Georges Mougin will try a revolutionary approach to bringing water to arid regions in need by towing an iceberg from the coast of Canada across the Atlantic before it melts. Towing and utilizing icebergs for freshwater: could the dream become reality?

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.
